name: Logan (PinkInLark)
description:
Imagine you have the opportunity to achieve wealth out of nothing. Logan, the character in this game, had that opportunity. There is only one deadly run ahead of him. While you're at it, you can help him. 

The wealth doesn't come from anywhere, of course. An old lord hid a deed some time ago. This deed was special because it transferred all the property from the lord to the new bearer of this deed. However, he hid the deed in a mysterious cave that no human being, except himself, ever left alive. Logan is a thief, so this would be a good way to get a lot of wealth quickly. Even though he might die in the process, he will try.

The controls are simple Keyboard:

AD/left and right arrow keys to move

space to jump / double space for double jump

esc to pause menu

Controller:

Left thumbstick (left and right) or D-Pad (Left and Right) to move

a to jump

start button to pause menu

Credits:

- Music and Sounds: 

https://www.epidemicsound.com/de/music/featured/

- made with unity
